Bachelors Degree > Bachelor of Engineering > Bachelor of Engineering Electrical & Electronics

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Usha Nerli has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 7 years. Currently she is employed as an Informatica Developer at Statefarm Insurance. Usha has extensive knowledge of ETL, Oracle BI EE, Oracle PL/SQL, Oracle, Informatica Analytics Package > Informatica PowerCenter, XML, SQL, shell scripting, Logic Works ERwin/ERX, DB2, Control-M, UNIX, Teradata, Oracle 11g, Oracle 10G, OLTP, OLAP, Microsoft Visio, Mercury Quality Center, Korn Shell, JAD, Autosys, WinSCP, Sequence Generator, SAP ERP, Relational Database, Oracle ERP, Oracle Data Integrator, Manual Testing, Informatica MDM, Informatica, FileZilla, EDW. So far Usha has not gained any managerial experience.
